text: Carl "The Cuban" Ruiz (April 4, 1975 â€“ September 21, 2019) was a Cuban- American restaurant-owner and celebrity chef. He was born in Passaic, New Jersey. Ruiz was best known as a judge on many cooking competition shows on Food Network in the United States. He was also known for working with Guy Fieri and was a judge on his shows, including Guy's Grocery Games and Guy's Ranch Kitchen. Ruiz died in his sleep on September 21, 2019, of a suspected heart attack while visiting friends in Maryland, aged 44.Bruce Haring, "Food Network's Carl Ruiz Dead at 44: Guy Fieri and More Stars Pay Tribute," MSN Entertainment, September 22, 2019. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American chefs Category:People from Passaic, New Jersey Category:Television personalities from New Jersey
